snippet: As a businessman, Mr. Trump has relied on the type of cheap foreign labor that he vows to clamp down on if elected president....
abstract: Donald Trump's business history of relying on foreign labor and placing profits before America, practices he has derided on campaign trail, outlined.
lead_paragraph: As a businessman, Mr. Trump has relied on the type of cheap foreign labor that he vows to clamp down on if elected president.

headline.main: Donald Trump Has Long Benefited From Trade Practices He Now Scorns
headline.print_headline: The Businessman Benefits From Trade Practices That the Candidate Scorns
